wikipedia_page.main: William Gibson (born 1 August 1981) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a defender or a midfielder for Kilbirnie Ladeside in the Scottish Junior Football Association, West Region. He has previously played in the Scottish Premier League for Partick Thistle.

response: *Billy Gibson (footballer, born 1981), Scottish footballer who played for Partick Thistle
*Billy Gibson (footballer, born 1990), English footballer who played for Yeovil Town
